gobblin.writer

Class BufferedAsyncDataWriter<D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.writer.BufferedAsyncDataWriter<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - data record type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncDataWriter<D>, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @Alpha
public abstract class BufferedAsyncDataWriter<D>
extends Object
implements AsyncDataWriter<D>
    An async data writer which can achieve the buffering and batching capability. Internally it uses BatchAccumulator to accumulate input records. The records will be converted to batches according to the accumulator implementation. The RecordProcessor is responsible to iterate all available batches and write each batch via a BatchAsyncDataWriter
